tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE child_education_records (
  child_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  child_name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  grade_level VARCHAR(10),
  teacher_name VARCHAR(50),
  school_name VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE child_education_records (
    child_id INT,
    parent_id INT,
    grade_level VARCHAR(10),
    subjects TEXT,
    PRIMARY KEY (child_id)
);

CREATE TABLE school_performance_data (
    school_id INT,
    student_id INT,
    academic_year VARCHAR(10),
    gpa DECIMAL(4,2),
    behavior_score INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (school_id, student_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Child_Education_Records (
    child_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    grade_level VARCHAR(10),
    school_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE School_Performance_Data (
    school_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    school_name VARCHAR(100),
    city VARCHAR(50),
    state VARCHAR(2),
    district VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Custody_Evaluations (
    evaluation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    child_id INT,
    evaluator_name VARCHAR(50),
    evaluation_date DATE,
    evaluation_result VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE child_education_records (
    child_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    child_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    grade_level VARCHAR(10),
    guardian_name VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE school_performance_data (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    child_id INT,
    school_name VARCHAR(50),
    performance_score FLOAT,
    teacher_name VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE custody_evaluations (
    evaluation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    evaluator_name VARCHAR(50),
    evaluation_date DATE,
    custody_decision VARCHAR(100),
    comments TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE school_districts (
    district_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    district_name VARCHAR(50),
    district_location VARCHAR(50),
    contact_person VARCHAR(50),
    contact_email VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Child_Education (
    child_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    child_name VARCHAR(50),
    grade_level VARCHAR(10),
    school_name VARCHAR(50),
    teacher_name VARCHAR(50),
    subject VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE School_Performance (
    school_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    school_name VARCHAR(50),
    average_grade DECIMAL(3, 2),
    school_district VARCHAR(50),
    total_enrollment INT,
    graduation_rate DECIMAL(3, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE Custody_Evaluation (
    evaluation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    child_id INT,
    evaluator_name VARCHAR(50),
    evaluation_date DATE,
    evaluation_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Parent_Info (
    parent_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    parent_name VARCHAR(50),
    address VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    email VARCHAR(50),
    occupation VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Custody_Decision (
    decision_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    evaluation_id INT,
    parent_id INT,
    custody_awarded_to VARCHAR(50),
    visitation_schedule TEXT,
    decision_date DATE
);
